text: Marius van Heerden (8 September 1974 - 22 January 2021) was a South African middle-distance runner. He competed in the men's 800 metres at the 1996 Summer Olympics. He was born in Clanwilliam, South Africa. Van Heerden died on 22 January 2021 in Cape Town from COVID-19, aged 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for South Africa Category:South African athletes Category:Middle-distance runners Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in South Africa
title: Marius van Heerden
